content:
Here are some of the data points or properties that may be required for the returns and exchanges business scenario:

1. Order number or transaction ID
2. Customer name and contact information
3. Product code or SKU (Stock Keeping Unit)
4. Reason for return or exchange
5. Return or exchange request date
6. Product condition (e.g. unopened, opened, damaged)
7. Refund or exchange request amount
8. Refund or exchange approval or rejection date
9. Refund or exchange payment method
10. Refund or exchange transaction number
11. Shipping address for return or exchange
12. Shipping carrier or provider for return or exchange
13. Tracking number for return or exchange
14. Return or exchange approval or rejection reason
15. Inventory management (e.g. restocking, disposal, donation)

Please note that the actual data points or properties required for the returns and exchanges business scenario may vary depending on the specific needs of your business and the types of products being sold and returned.
